name: Unstable Space (Faber7)
description:
You awaken in a distant galaxy, you only know you must build, replicate and expand...

That is until a part of you decides it wants to do the same thing without you..

This is probably very unstable and will crash often, maybe that's on theme?

Left click to select stars, planets, and ships.

Scroll wheel to zoom in and out or double click on stars to zoom to.

Right click to move ships, zoom out  and right click to travel to other stars.
